titleStmt.title: A sermon preached in S. Peters Church at West-Chester the XXV. of September, 1586 Containing matter fit for the time: by Edward Hutchins Maister of Arts, and fellowe of Brazennose College.
titleStmt.author: Hutchins, Edward, 1558?-1629.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Ioseph Barnes, and are to be sold in Pauls Church-yarde [by T. Cooke, London] at the signe of the Tygers head,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A sermon preached at West-chester.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the signe of the Tygers head
